column1: Little Goat Diner////The honest to goodness star of the meal was the "This little piggy went to China". It starts with a sesame cheddar biscuit
column2: szechuan pork sausage topped with chili garlic
column3: chive sauce and blackberries topped with a sunny egg. It was sweet
column8: delicious! It was all we talked about after we ate there
column9: and now looking at the pictures I am having some withdrawls. This restuarnt is so good!
